Dialogs.Text: Thomas B: The first user i met was MsMaki95, an artist that discovered this server along with a group of users.
Thomas B: She mentioned there was 2 groups of people in the chat, 'The Lost Media Archive' and 'The Sun Cult'.
Thomas B: The latter i don't have much information on, but the first one is known for archiving lost media and abandonware.
Thomas B: In fact, Maki was able to access this server thanks to an invitation extended to her from them.
Thomas B: While talking to her, she ask me to help her in a certain task, which allowed me to understand what the group was doing.
Thomas B: Besides exploring this place because it was considered lost media for a while...
Thomas B: What other activity was the group engaging with in this chat?

Elections.CandidateName: Making the server his official group chat
